title: Now They Say The Vaxx Pass System Will NEVER END & Soon FORCED MANDATORY JABS Will Be A Reality!!!
cleaned_text:
Welp it looks like the “conspiracy theorists” were right as the powers that ought not be are now openly discussing the idea that the vaccine passport system will go on forever and that mandatory forced jabs will also soon be a reality for some. Meanwhile the omicron variant has killed less people than Alec Baldwin has yet this hasn’t stopped them from using it to ramp up the fear state! In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the latest Covid-19(84) news while most importantly explaining what you need to do now in order to protect yourself and your family from the tyranny that is coming.

 

WATCH ON ➜ ODYSEE
